content: Hello all. I'm working with SMART on FHIR, and have been using Epic's LaunchPad to get a test server with SMART on FHIR with OAuth2 protection. This uses DSTU2. I'm currently trying to implement multiversion support for DSTU2 and STU3, but I am not sure where to find a test server for SMART on FHIR using STU3 that has OAuth2 protection. Is anyone aware of something like this? Thanks!

For testing STU3 SMART applications, an excellent choice is the HSPC sandbox, see https://sandbox.hspconsortium.org Create a free account, create an STU3 sandbox instance, and you have a full SMART stack for OAuth2 app testing. Also create a DSTU2 sandbox instance.
Thank you both! I have been using the HSPC sandbox and this has been functional.
